text: When u can't get to the pub for #MothersDay2021 u go to the #vaccine hub! Huge thanks to all my colleagues @RoyalSurrey @OurRSFamily @LiannePegg @Veronik01113216 for giving up their special sunday to vaccinate staff, colleagues & the local community! #TogetherWeCan beat #COVID19 https://t.co/D1RruBatqB
